post:
Why to choose a VPS hosting plan offered by QHoster.com:

- In business since 2004 (Registered company in European Union)
- Always Intel Xeon Processors
- Instant VPS setup
- 24/7 technical support
- Highly secured and well maintained servers
- cPanel, Plesk and other control panels including security setup during provisioning
- Custom Reverse DNS (RDNS) records


For what I can use my virtual private server (VPS)?


OpenVPN/PPTP/L2TP/IPSec
MMORPG
Game server
IRC
Monitoring
DNS
Learning
Development
Mail server
Web server
Database server
Private proxy
Remote desktop
Hosting own websites
Resell hosting
A lot more ...

FAQ:

Q: Do you offer cPanel, Plesk, Fantastico, RVSkins and other hosting control panels and auto-installers?
A: Yes. We offer all hosting software like control panels (cPanel, Plesk, DirectAdmin, InterWorx, ISPManager, Kloxo), sitebuiders (RVSiteBuilder, Trendy Flash Builder), auto-installers (Softaculous, Fantastico).

Q: What payment methods are accepted?
A: We accept PayPal, Credit/Debit Cards, AlertPay (Payza), Skrill (MoneyBookers), Liberty Reserve

Q: What is your average setup time?
A: All VPSes are setup instantly so you do not need to wait.

Q: How long have you been in business?
A: Since 2004, registered company in EU.

Q: Do you allow adult content?
A: Yes, we allow legal adult content on our servers in USA (Germany is not Adult friendly).

Q: Do you allow VPN & proxies on your server?
A: Yes, you we allow VPN & private proxies on our servers.

Q: Do you have any discounts for longer payment periods?
A: We offer 10% discount if you pay for your order Annually.

Q: Can we setup VPN with our VPS server?
A: Yes all servers have OpenVPN, PPTP and L2TP/IPSec support.

Q: Do you offer Reverse-DNS (RDNS)?
A: Yes you can modify the RDNS for your IP address/es.
